column4: when will Gaim 1.0.0.2 ve at the repository? does anyone knows ?
dunno, the package name says 1.0.0 no minor number
did you migrate your config from an older version ? my gaim works fine since weeks
so you were supposed to do a dist upgrade to get your system to the final version
probably a lib is not up to date which causes gaim to break....else i'd suspect your config, so move it to a backup and try starting gaim
yep and if you're using a scanner also Warty-Pre
yep, you'll need the user in the scanner group
a device that produces electrons from printed paper ;)
just looked at the wiki, dont forget: sudo apt-get update before anything else
